field.name: HSIKERON
field.description: HSI always enable for peripheral kernels

field.name: STOPWUCK
field.description: Wakeup from Stop and CSS backup clock selection

field.name: PLLR
field.description: Main PLL division factor for PLLCLK (system clock)

field.name: PLLQ
field.description: Main PLL division factor for PLLUSB1CLK(48 MHz clock)

field.name: PLLP
field.description: Main PLL division factor for PLLSAI3CLK (SAI1 and SAI2 clock)

field.name: PLLN
field.description: Main PLL multiplication factor for VCO

field.name: PLLM
field.description: Division factor for the main PLL and audio PLL (PLLSAI1 and PLLSAI2) input clock

field.name: PLLSRC
field.description: Main PLL, PLLSAI1 and PLLSAI2 entry clock source

field.name: PLLSAI1R
field.description: PLLSAI1 division factor for PLLADC1CLK (ADC clock)

field.name: PLLSAI1Q
field.description: SAI1PLL division factor for PLLUSB2CLK (48 MHz clock)

field.name: PLLSAI1P
field.description: SAI1PLL division factor for PLLSAI1CLK (SAI1 or SAI2 clock)

field.name: PLLSAI2R
field.description: PLLSAI2 division factor for PLLADC2CLK (ADC clock)

field.name: PLLSAI2P
field.description: SAI1PLL division factor for PLLSAI2CLK (SAI1 or SAI2 clock)

field.description: LSE Clock security system interrupt clear

field.name: DFSDMRST
field.description: Digital filters for sigma-delata modulators (DFSDM) reset
